en.title: Senior computer technician, specializing in programming
en.institution: Instituto Universitario de Tecnología Industrial Rodolfo Loero Arismendi (IUTIRLA)
description: Training in software development, with focus on C/C++, C#, Visual Basic, and database management.
Thesis: Automated system for the administration of computer equipment in the police department.
